snippet.title: TimeSplitters 4 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Free Radical Designs TimeSplitters 4 teaser trailer from fall of 2007 in HD or as close as its going to get to HD. 

If you want TimeSplitters 4 please like the 100,000 Strong for TimeSplitters 4 Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/Timesplitters4PLZ

also sign the new petition with over 62,000 signatures.  If we get 300,000 Crytek essentially confirmed they will do a HD remake of TimeSplitters 2.

https://www.change.org/en-GB/petitions/crytek-uk-create-a-timesplitters-hd-collection

I tried to get the best quality video I could as many of the trailers are fairly low quality the original isn't probably quite HD I think it was 640x360 but I was able to get it looking pretty decent and much clearer than versions on Youtube.

Please Join the Facebook group 100,000 Strong for Timesplitters 4 https://www.facebook.com/Timesplitters4PLZ

Also tweet Crytek President Cevat Yerli @RealtimeCevat and let him know you want TimeSplitters 4.

I created a little TimeSplitters fan site if you want to check it out its http://www.itstimetosplit.com.
